• Mon 5pm: Drivers no longer have separate listings for "to" and "from" trips, which will result in better accuracy.
  • Sat 7pm: Because changes FB has made, you must search for potential matches by name on FB.
  • Mon 9am: We have a new collaboration with balik.undirabu.com!
  • Sat 5pm: You can now mark your listing as fulfilled, or cancel it. Please do so as it helps improve our system.
